original_text: The Ammonites and Moabites rose up against the men from Mount Seir to destroy and annihilate them. After they finished slaughtering the men from Seir, they helped to destroy one another.
korean_text: 곧 암몬과 모압 자손이 일어나 세일 산 주민들을 쳐서 진멸하고 세일 주민들을 멸한 후에는 그들이 서로 쳐죽였더라

sentences.original_text: The Ammonites and Moabites rose up
against the men from Mount Seir
After they finished slaughtering the men from Seir
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 세일 사람들을 학살을 마친 후에

sentences.original_text: they helped to destroy one another
